[00:00.00]Heat Waves (Diplo Remix) - Glass Animals
[00:00.19]Lyrics by：Dave Bayley
[00:00.39]Composed by：Dave Bayley
[00:00.58]Road shimmer wigglin' the vision
[00:03.63]Heat heat waves I'm swimmin' in a mirror
[00:07.73]Road shimmer wigglin' the vision
[00:10.86]Heat heat waves I'm swimmin' in a mirror
[00:14.55]I just wonder what you're dreamin' of
[00:17.97]When you sleep and smile so comfortable
[00:21.39]I just wish that I could give you that
[00:25.09]That look that's perfectly un-sad
[00:28.52]Sometimes all I think about is you
[00:31.94]Late nights in the middle of June
[00:35.57]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[00:38.97]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[00:42.41]Sometimes all I think about is you
[00:46.03]Late nights in the middle of June
[00:49.55]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[00:53.03]Can't make you happier now
[00:56.56]Sometimes all I think about is you

data.trans:
[ti:Heat Waves (Diplo Remix)]
[ar:Glass Animals]
[al:Heat Waves (Diplo Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.19]//
[00:00.38]//
[00:00.58]眼前的道路光芒闪烁 幻象摇曳
[00:03.63]热浪来袭 我徜徉在镜花水月里
[00:07.73]眼前的道路光芒闪烁 幻象摇曳
[00:10.86]热浪来袭 我徜徉在镜花水月里
[00:14.55]我只想知道你梦见了什么
[00:17.97]当你酣然入睡 浅浅的笑容让人感到安心
[00:21.39]我希望我可以让你如愿
[00:25.09]露出没有一丝悲伤的表情
[00:28.52]有时 我脑海里想的全是你
[00:31.94]六月中旬的深夜时分
[00:35.57]热浪来袭 蒙蔽我的双眼
[00:38.97]热浪来袭 蒙蔽我的双眼
[00:42.41]有时 我脑海里想的全是你
[00:46.03]六月中旬的深夜时分

[00:53.03]如今我无法让你感到幸福
[00:56.56]有时 我脑海里想的全是你
